pullrequest.title: Move rerun failed test code to separate script

content.raw:
it failed because it couldn't get an absolute path in the `SCRIPT_DIR` variable and then tried to call the script after a `cd`

there is a GNU readlink command in a brew package (see [stackoverflow post](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1055671/how-can-i-get-the-behavior-of-gnus-readlink-f-on-a-mac/4031502#4031502)), but we may run into the same issues as we have with mercurial, since this command needs to be called so early in the script.

maybe we just need to manually install mercurial and readlink into /usr on osx?
